name: 2 Broke Girls
description: Two young women waitressing at a greasy spoon diner strike up an unlikely friendship in the hopes of launching a successful business - if only they can raise the cash.

name: Alf
description: A furry alien wiseguy comes to live with the Tanner family after crashing into their garage.

name: Becker
description: Dr. John Becker goes through his daily routine of being a doctor, stopping at his favorite diner, and other various situations, all the while hating life and everything around him.

name: The Persuaders!
description: Two worlds collide when the titled Englishman, Lord Brett Sinclair, and the Bronx-raised, self-made American Danny Wilde, reluctantly join forces to right wrongs, and to protect the innocent.

name: Hogans Heros
description: The inmates of a German World War II prisoner of war camp conduct an espionage and sabotage campaign right under the noses of their warders.

name: Leverage
description: A crew of high-tech crooks attempt to steal from wealthy criminals and corrupt businessmen.

name: Orange Is the New Black
description: Convicted of a decade old crime of transporting drug money to an ex-girlfriend, normally law abiding Piper Chapman is sentenced to a year and a half behind bars to face the reality of how life changing prison can really be.

name: Supernatural
description: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds, including monsters, demons, and gods that roam the earth.

name: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
description: Yoda, Mace Windu, Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker and other Jedi Knights lead the Grand Army of the Republic against the droid army of the Separatists.

name: Star Wars: Rebels
description: A brave and clever ragtag starship crew stands up against the evil Empire as it tightens its grip on the galaxy and hunts down the last of the Jedi Knights.
